entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
